child_geo_events.address: 700 Sulphur Creek Rd, Meeker, CO 81641, USA
child_geo_events.name: Livestock Shelter - Rio Blanco County Fairgrounds

data.information:
Livestock can be taken to the Rio Blanco County Fairgrounds located at 700 Sulphur Creek Rd, Meeker, CO 81641.

The Rio Blanco County Fairgrounds is providing emergency shelter for evacuated livestock during the Elk and Lee Fires.

FACILITIES AVAILABLE:

• Outdoor pens and stalls for horses

• Small indoor pens for goats, sheep, and pigs

• Poultry cages

WHAT TO BRING:

• Hay or feed for poultry

• Water buckets

IMPORTANT: Due to the fairgrounds serving as the Incident Command Post, you will need to leave your animals in the care of the facility manager and CSU Extension staff. Nick and Dessa will handle all feeding, watering, and care.

CONTACT:

Nick Smith, RBC Fairgrounds Manager

• 970-878-9498

• 970-755-1628

Per Rio Blanco County.

An evacuation center is established at the Fairfield Center located at 200 Main Street, Meeker.

Per Rio Blanco County.

data.evacuation_notes: Evacuation MapNote: On the Routt County Evacuation Map, “Monitor” is equivalent to “Ready,” “Pre-Evacuate” is equivalent to “Set,” and “Evacuate” is equivalent to “Go.” Road Closures: Routt County Road 15 from the intersection of Routt County Road 17 to Crosho Lake.
data.reporter_only_notes:
Despite 100% containment, Routt County said "All zones remain in monitor status and will stay that way until the incident is fully resolved". AJ 08/26/25

Evac zone changes need to use both sets of terminology below, as the zones are across 3 counties now. --JW/LW

GO (Evacuate)
SET (Pre-Evacuate)
READY (Monitor)

data.reporter_only_notes:
Be sure to watch for timed evac zone downgrades on 08/27/25. See post on Aug 26th at 5:31PM for more details. AJ 08/26/25

For clarity, Eagle County zone GYF-265 (smaller portion) has been "turned off" on the Eagle County Emergency Map and Genasys map so that the two zones are no longer overlapping. AJJ 08/24

There are duplicate zones named "GYF-265" which overlap and have conflicting statuses. The external status for the larger zone is incorrect. We've labeled them smaller/larger portion in custom evac notes to differentiate the two. Ensure that you toggle the correct zone to the correct status. Double-check the Watch Duty map with the linked official map. ~LW 8/24

address: Dollar Lake / Green River Lakes Area

data.evacuation_orders: A five-mile radius around Dollar Lake in the Green River Lakes area.  The Red Cliff Bible Camp in Cora, WY.
data.evacuation_warnings: All residences on Moose Gypsum Road, Hill Road, Valley View Trail, Hecox Road, Pine Drive; Rock Creek Road, Brookie Lane, White Point Road, Rainbow Drive, Trout Drive, Cutthroat Drive and River Road; Cattle Drive Lane, Terrace Drive, Half-way Drive; all residences off Galley Lane; and all residences along US Hwy 352 South to Richard Lane.
data.reporter_only_notes:
The fire burned very aggressively today toward the east into the wilderness. Jaimee and I discussed adding Fremont County but decided it's still a little far from the county line for that. I suggest using the Shoshone NF boundary as a trigger point to the E and Seven Lakes ATV trail to the N for adding Fremont county. Lots of wilderness out there, lots of room to run.

NIFC has 10,000 right now, not using since we have a perimeter at 13,000 8/26 -EJ

data.reporter_only_notes:

Deschutes County zones are pulled from Genasys. Jefferson County zones are pulled from RAPTOR, they will not show as pre-planned and will display as updated in RAPTOR map. If a zone is toggled but not visible check that it has a name on RAPTOR. If no name contact David or Rob Scobie. RAPTOR evacuation map

-JR 8/22
